ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all, I have read with great interest some of the rants on this here list and I have to tell ya, y all are hilarious.  Everyone has their points and
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all,
I have read with great interest some of the rants on this here list and I
have to tell ya, y'all are hilarious. Everyone has their points and they
are good points. 2cp's worth.

Now, on to the reply...
I was fortunate enuf to have a higher level friend who obtained for me the
ruined totem staff, there is a certain ghoul that has taken more of my lives
than anything else and I asked him to get it for me for the sole purpose of
retribution, big time!! as for hitting other creatures with it, I hardly
use melee anymore, and I am only 10th lvl, but the Magic properties of this
fine weapon, the hitting of magical creatures, is well worth carrying it,
and besides, I could always sell it for the 3p+ I was offered for it from
the merchants.

Tovan
Rathe lake server
Felwithe city enchanter
